mapper.select: SELECT /* CartDao.getCartList */ A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, A.PLACE_ID AS placeId, A.TOTAL_PRICE, A.ADULT_NUM, A.KID_NUM, A.BABY_NUM, A.DATE_FROM, A.DATE_TO, B.ID AS id, B.NAME, B.IMG_PATH FROM carts A LEFT OUTER JOIN places B ON A.PLACE_ID = B.ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY A.MEMBER_ID

SELECT /* CartDao.getSelectedCartList */ A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, A.PLACE_ID AS placeId, A.TOTAL_PRICE, A.ADULT_NUM, A.KID_NUM, A.BABY_NUM, B.ID AS id, B.NAME, B.IMG_PATH FROM carts A LEFT OUTER JOIN places B ON A.PLACE_ID = B.ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.PLACE_ID IN #{placeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY A.MEMBER_ID, A.PLACE_ID
